0.title: [stationName] First Frost of the Autumn
0.subTitle: Maximum number of consecutive weeks above zero Celcius
0.caption: The date of the first fall frost, which marks the approximate end of the growing season for frost-sensitive crops and plants. This is calculated from temperature data.

yAxis.left: First date with temperatures record below 0°C

1.title: [stationName] First Autumn Frost - Difference from Baseline
1.caption: The difference between the date of the first autumn frost for the year and the average for the baseline period, typically 1961 to 1990. This is calculated from temperature data.

yAxis.left: First date with temperatures record below 0°C Difference
